page.title: 20HOUSES
page.content: There are a lot of different types of houses in the area some are detached and a few are terraced,several are farmhouses.They are well spread out.There are a few new houses in the area but most are old houses.A lot of them have been modernised.Some of the modern houses have gas or electric fires and central heating while some of the older houses have coal fires and chimneys.The old houses are made of stone while the newer ones are made of brick with tiled roofs, the old houses have slate roofs. Most of the houses are privately owned but a few are council houses.At the crossroads in Bosley there is a small site for mobile homes.
